mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_puuid, m.menu_uuid, CASE WHEN pm.menu_name IS NULL THEN '' ELSE pm.menu_name END AS menu_pname, m.menu_name FROM ht_admin_menu m LEFT JOIN ht_admin_menu pm ON m.menu_puuid = pm.menu_uuid WHERE m.menu_uuid != '0' ORDER BY pm.menu_sort ASC, m.menu_sort ASC

SELECT menu.menu_puuid, menu.menu_uuid, menu.menu_name, menu.menu_icon, menu.menu_sort, perm.permission_uuid, perm.permission_name
,armp.role_id
,'' as role_id
FROM ht_admin_menu menu LEFT JOIN ht_admin_menu_permssions amp ON menu.menu_uuid = amp.menu_id LEFT JOIN ht_admin_permissions perm ON perm.permission_uuid = amp.permission_id AND perm.del_flag = '0'
LEFT JOIN ht_admin_role_menu_permissions armp ON menu.menu_uuid = armp.menu_uuid and armp.del_flag='0' AND perm.permission_uuid = armp.permission_uuid AND armp.role_id = #{roleId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND armp.del_flag = '0'
WHERE menu.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY menu.menu_puuid, menu.menu_sort, menu.menu_uuid, perm.permission_uuid
select CONCAT(menu_uuid,'_',permission_uuid) from ht_admin_role_menu_permissions where role_id= #{menuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: delete from ht_admin_role_menu_permissions where menu_uuid in (select menu_uuid from ht_admin_menu where del_flag=1 ) and role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
